subject: for kristin  RE: [EVP-ITC] Couple from Joe's Box this morning
author: Ron Lederer
full_text:
--0-1108280899-1207318154=:65103
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

Boy you hit on my big question...who is it communicating at the other end...how are they organized...are they restricted from telling us certain things...and of course where are they.  Once we accept that the messages are real and not from other "living humans" then all these other questions come up.  It seems that if we restrict our questioning to "spiritual" issues the communications flows.  
   
  I am also wondering what happened to the techinical type communications that the old Spiritcom pioneers used to get.  Still would like to hear an answer to what causes autism in children?  What's the harm in answering that question?   Ron L

Kristin Morris <ckmorris95@...> wrote:
              I heard all of those as you did.. but I read Margaret�s response to your files and I agree that I hear Mother Fkr at the end of the Adios clip.  It�s rough but there.
  And I have no clue who these spirits are.  My gut tells me they are people who have died.. but I can�t say if my gut is right or not.  I noticed they don�t like to talk about themselves.  Why the big secret?  To me that is the bigger mystery.
  k
  
      
---------------------------------
  
  From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of Steve Hultay
Sent: Thursday, April 03, 2008 10:18 PM
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Couple from Joe's Box this morning

  
        
Couple pretty good files in here, sorry for the cursing file. That 
makes this more real to me and they know that. I don't believe they 
curse because they don't like me, i think they know i post the audio 
for others to hear and want to prove their existence. I also got 
the "Are We Dead?" file. That maybe the first clear message that's 
relevant to what we are doing, it must be grounded spirits asking 
that. If anyone has any thoughts of who would say that, it may be 
another discussion. Maybe it's not grounded spirits, but whom than?

-Steve H.

  



  

                           

       
---------------------------------
You rock. That's why Blockbuster's offering you one month of Blockbuster Total Access, No Cost.
